item.title: Version 3.12.0
item.description:
## PlunderTube 3.12.0
### Download - **DMG Installer**: PlunderTube.3.12.0.dmg - **PKG Installer**: PlunderTube.3.12.0.pkg
### What's Included - Audio Unit (AU) Plugin - VST3 Plugin - Standalone Application - Automatic Python/UV environment setup - FFmpeg and yt-dlp included
### Installation 1. Download the DMG file 2. Open and run the PKG installer 3. Restart your DAW if running
### System Requirements - macOS 14.0 or later (ARM64) - Compatible DAW for plugin formats
### Release Type: RELEASE
